title: Input schema for Instagram scraper
description:
Below you can provide search query which will be used to search Instagram for profiles, hashtags or places. Alternatively you can provide direct page urls.
Then on each page you can scrape page details, posts or comments.
Important: Proxy is required to use this solution

search.title: Search
search.description:
Here you can provide a search query which will be used to search Instagram for profiles, hashtags or places.

This field is optional, but this field or 'Direct Instagram page URLs' must be provided (or both)

searchType.title: Search type
searchType.description: What type of pages to search (you can search hashtags, profiles and places)

searchLimit.title: Search results limit
searchLimit.description: How many search results (eq. pages) should be processed

directUrls.title: Direct Instagram page URLs
directUrls.description:
If you already have URL(s) of page(s) you wish to scrape, you can set them here.

This field is optional, but this field or 'Search' must be provided (or both)

resultsType.title: What to scrape from each page
resultsType.description: What to scrape from each Instagram page URL or search result

resultsLimit.title: Max items
resultsLimit.description: How many posts or comments to scrape from each Instagram URL or found page, ignored when "Details" type is specified

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.
